p: In practice, the antiviral drugs dispensed during the 2009 influenza pandemic generally failed to contain transmission. This prompts us to ask why timely administration of antiviral drugs to a sufficient number of cases, exposed individuals and individuals at high risk of exposure did not occur. Could we have done better? On a future occasion, should we even attempt to contain transmission with the assistance of antiviral drugs? A consideration of these questions will inform preparedness plans for the next pandemic.
